Structs/XCTAssertMetric/Aspect.html#/s:8.name: average(maximum:)
Structs/XCTAssertMetric/Aspect.html#/s:8.abstract: Represents the average maximum of the collected measurements.

Structs/XCTAssertMetric/Aspect.html#/s:8.name: relativeStandardDeviation(maximum:)
Structs/XCTAssertMetric/Aspect.html#/s:8.abstract: Represents the relative standard deviation of the collected measurements.

Structs/XCTAssertMetric.html#/s:8XCTBeto.name: cpu
Structs/XCTAssertMetric.html#/s:8XCTBeto.abstract: Can be used to make assertions for the collected XCTCPUMetrics.

Structs/XCTAssertMetric.html#/s:8XCTBeto.name: memory
Structs/XCTAssertMetric.html#/s:8XCTBeto.abstract: Can be used to make assertions for the collected XCTMemoryMetrics.

Structs/XCTAssertMetric.html#/s:8XCTBeto.name: disk
Structs/XCTAssertMetric.html#/s:8XCTBeto.abstract: Can be used to make assertions for the collected XCTStorageMetrics.

Structs/XCTAssertMetric.html#/s:8XCTBeto.name: clock
Structs/XCTAssertMetric.html#/s:8XCTBeto.abstract: Can be used to make assertions for the collected XCTClockMetrics.

Structs/XCTAssertMetric/Aspect.html.name: Aspect
Structs/XCTAssertMetric/Aspect.html.abstract: Represents the type of value what you can assert for.

Structs/XCTAssertMetric.html.name: XCTAssertMetric
Structs/XCTAssertMetric.html.abstract: Represents the type of metric you can make assertions for, like cpu or memory.

Protocols/XCTAssertMetricIdentifier.html.name: identifier
Protocols/XCTAssertMetricIdentifier.html.abstract: The characteristic you want to make assertion for using XCTAssertMetric(_:_:_:_:file:line:).

Protocols/XCTAssertMetricIdentifier.html.name: XCTAssertMetricIdentifier
Protocols/XCTAssertMetricIdentifier.html.abstract: Identifies the type of measurements when making assertions.

Enums/XCTAssertCpuIdentifier.html#/s:8XC.name: time
Enums/XCTAssertCpuIdentifier.html#/s:8XC.abstract: CPU time is the length of time, in seconds, that the CPU is active and executing instructions for the measured

Enums/XCTAssertCpuIdentifier.html#/s:8XC.name: cycles
Enums/XCTAssertCpuIdentifier.html#/s:8XC.abstract: CPU cycles is the number of clock cycles that occur while the CPU is active and executing instructions for the

Enums/XCTAssertCpuIdentifier.html#/s:8XC.name: instructionsRetired
Enums/XCTAssertCpuIdentifier.html#/s:8XC.abstract: CPU instructions retired is the number of processor instructions that run to completion during execution of the

Enums/XCTAssertClockIdentifier.html#/s:8.name: timeMonotonic
Enums/XCTAssertClockIdentifier.html#/s:8.abstract: Represents monotonic records of time, regardless of changes to the system clock. These result includes time spent

Enums/XCTAssertClockIdentifier.html.name: XCTAssertClockIdentifier
Enums/XCTAssertClockIdentifier.html.abstract: Identifies the type of time you want to make assertion for in a performance test.

Enums/XCTAssertCpuIdentifier.html.name: XCTAssertCpuIdentifier
Enums/XCTAssertCpuIdentifier.html.abstract: Identifies the type of CPU statistic you want to make assertion for in a performance test.

Enums/XCTAssertDiskIdentifier.html.name: XCTAssertDiskIdentifier
Enums/XCTAssertDiskIdentifier.html.abstract: Identifies the type of disk usage you want to make assertion for in a performance test.

Enums/XCTAssertMemoryIdentifier.html.name: XCTAssertMemoryIdentifier
Enums/XCTAssertMemoryIdentifier.html.abstract: Identifies the type of memory usage you want to make assertion for in a performance test.

Classes/XCTestCase.html#/c:@M@XCTBeton@o.name: defaultMeasureOptions
Classes/XCTestCase.html#/c:@M@XCTBeton@o.abstract: Default options for measure(_:). The default instance specifies 5 iteration counts.

Classes/XCTestCase.html#/s:8XCTBeton10XC.name: XCTAssertMetric(_:_:_:_:file:line:)
Classes/XCTestCase.html#/s:8XCTBeton10XC.abstract: Asserts that the given metric has the expected aspect.

Classes/XCTestCase.html#/s:8XCTBeton10XC.name: measure(_:)
Classes/XCTestCase.html#/s:8XCTBeton10XC.abstract: Measures the performance of a block of code.

Classes/XCTestCase.html#/s:8XCTBeton10XC.name: measure(metrics:block:)
Classes/XCTestCase.html#/s:8XCTBeton10XC.abstract: Records the selected metrics for a block of code.

Classes/XCTestCase.html#/s:8XCTBeton10XC.name: measure(options:block:)
Classes/XCTestCase.html#/s:8XCTBeton10XC.abstract: Records the performance, using the specified measurement options, for a block of code.

Classes/XCTestCase.html#/s:8XCTBeton10XC.name: measure(metrics:options:block:)
Classes/XCTestCase.html#/s:8XCTBeton10XC.abstract: Records the selected metrics, using the specified measurement options, for a block of code.

Classes/XCTStorageMetric.html#/c:@M@XCTB.name: reportMeasurements(from:to:)
Classes/XCTStorageMetric.html#/c:@M@XCTB.abstract: Reports the measurements gathered for a metric between specific timestamps.

Classes/XCTMemoryMetric.html#/c:@M@XCTBe.name: reportMeasurements(from:to:)
Classes/XCTMemoryMetric.html#/c:@M@XCTBe.abstract: Reports the measurements gathered for a metric between specific timestamps.

Classes/XCTClockMetric.html#/c:@M@XCTBet.name: reportMeasurements(from:to:)
Classes/XCTClockMetric.html#/c:@M@XCTBet.abstract: Reports the measurements gathered for a metric between specific timestamps.

Classes/XCTCPUMetric.html#/c:@M@XCTBeton.name: reportMeasurements(from:to:)
Classes/XCTCPUMetric.html#/c:@M@XCTBeton.abstract: Reports the measurements gathered for a metric between specific timestamps.

Classes/XCTCPUMetric.html.name: XCTCPUMetric
Classes/XCTCPUMetric.html.abstract: A metric to record information about CPU activity during a performance test.

Classes/XCTClockMetric.html.name: XCTClockMetric
Classes/XCTClockMetric.html.abstract: A metric to record the time that elapses during a performance test.

Classes/XCTMemoryMetric.html.name: XCTMemoryMetric
Classes/XCTMemoryMetric.html.abstract: A metric to record the physical memory that a performance test uses.

Classes/XCTStorageMetric.html.name: XCTStorageMetric
Classes/XCTStorageMetric.html.abstract: A metric to record the amount of data that a performance test logically writes to storage.

Classes/XCTestCase.html.name: XCTestCase
Classes/XCTestCase.html.abstract: The primary class to define tests in XCTBeton.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
